plusls-carpet-addition.rule.autoTrade.de: Use dispenser to auto trade with villager.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.autoTrade.ex: If EMERALD_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade once.
If DIAMOND_BLOCK under the dispenser, it will trade all.
Trade offer depend on redStone power.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.avoidAnvilTo: Allow anvil level cost above 40 (If the client is not installed mod, it will be too expensive but can be used in practice).
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.creativePlay: Creative Player No Direct Kill ArmorStand.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.dispenserCol: Dispenser use bottle to collect xp.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.emptyShulker: Empty shulker boxes can stack in a player's inventory or hand.
But empty shulker boxes will not stack in other inventories, such as chests or hoppers.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.flippingTote: Players can flip and rotate blocks when holding Totem Of Undying.
Doesn't cause block updates when rotated/flipped.
When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is empty will flip block.
When Totem Of Undying in main hand,  offhand is not empty, will place flipped block.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.forceRestock: Use spectral arrow to shoot villager to force restock.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.pcaSyncPlaye: Which player entity can be sync.
BOT: carpet bot will be sync.
OPS: carpet bot will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
OPS_AND_SELF: carpet bot and self data will be sync, and op can sync everyone's player entity data.
EVERYONE: everyone's player entity will be sync.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.pcaSyncProto: Support sync entity and blockEntity from server.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.playerOperat: One tick player can place 2 block, insta break 1 block, can't do it at the same tick.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.playerSit.de: Player can sit down when fast sneak 3 times.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.potionRecycl: Dispenser can clear potion to cauldron.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.powerfulBone: Allow use bone meal in cactus, sugar cane, chorus flower.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.renewableNet: Only in nether, throw the diamond equipment with 1 durability to lava fluid to get netherite equipment.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.sleepingDuri: World will switch to night when player sleep during the day.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.superLead.de: Leash villagers and mobs by lead.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.trackItemPic: When item pick up by player, item will freeze.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.useDyeOnShul: Dyes can be used on shulker boxes, empty potion will clean color.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.villagersAtt: Villagers are attracted by emerald block.
plusls-carpet-addition.rule.xaeroWorldNa: set xaero world name to sync word id to xaerominimap, "#none" is disable.
